thread.title: Heather Lord
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Heather Lord

author: Heather Lord
title: Heather Lord
text: We booked our Cook Island Holiday in Rarotonga with Patrick Carleton . This was our 4 th trip to the Cook Islands booked with him. Our Itinerary, flights ,accommodation ,documentation etc was excellent. We asked for help at the 3 Airports on our return journey and that was all organized professionally and it worked. We will keep on recommending Goway Travel to our family and friends.
